title: Nightmare Abbey - complexity of Mrs Glowry

content.question: The narrator suggests Mrs. Glowryâ€™s complexity by revealing a tension between her

choices.label: rude conduct toward others and her underlying concern for their welfare
deep unhappiness and her incapacity to acknowledge its cause
outward confidence in her own decisions and her underlying insecurities
appearance of apathy toward her husband and her need for his attention

content.answer: deep unhappiness and her incapacity to acknowledge its cause

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the function of conflict in a text.
